mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.title as title, c.price as price, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, c.cover as cover, c.buy_count as buyCount, c.view_count as viewCount, cd.description as description, c.teacher_id as teacherId, t.name as teacherName, t.intro as intro, t.avatar as avatar, c.subject_parent_id as subjectLevelOneId, s1.title as subjectLevelOne, c.subject_id as subjectLevelTwoId, s2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course c left join edu_teacher t on c.teacher_id = t.id left join edu_subject s1 on c.subject_parent_id = s1.id left join edu_subject s2 on c.subject_id = s2.id left join edu_course_description cd on c.id = cd.id where c.id = #{id}
